name: The Party is Over | 20 Second Game Jam [2022]
name_original: The Party is Over | 20 Second Game Jam [2022]
description:
The Party is Over is a game created for the 20 Second Game Jam, 2022 edition.

Your goal is to throw every item out of the window before the time runs out. And, as the name of the jam sugeste, you have to do it under 20 seconds!

Thank you for playing and hope that you like :)

*You can play the game on your browser or by downloading in your pc

Controls:

  • WASD - move
  • Mouse - look
  • Mouse Left - pick/throw object
